data.content:
Ivern: The Green Father

Release Date: October 5, 2016

On the mystical and enchanting lands of Runeterra, where magic and creatures of all kinds roam, there exists a unique champion known as Ivern, the Green Father. With his gentle demeanor and affinity for nature, Ivern brings a refreshing and unconventional playstyle to the game of League of Legends. In this article, we will delve into the depths of Ivern's story, his strengths and weaknesses, his background in the game, and his significant place within the League of Legends universe.

The Story of Ivern

Ivern's tale begins in the ancient forests of Kumungu, a lush and vibrant jungle teeming with life. Once a human named Ivern Bramblefoot, he found himself lost in the depths of the jungle after a particularly treacherous expedition. As he wandered, Ivern discovered a hidden grove, home to a mystical being known as the Green Father. This ancient entity, who embodied the essence of nature itself, saw the potential for greatness within Ivern and offered him a choice: to become one with the forest and protect the natural world.

Accepting the Green Father's offer, Ivern underwent a transformation, merging his essence with that of the forest. He became a being of pure magic, shedding his human form and embracing his new role as the protector of the jungle. Ivern's purpose became clear - to nurture and safeguard the delicate balance of nature, ensuring the survival of the flora and fauna that called the Kumungu jungle their home.

Strengths and Weaknesses

Ivern's unique playstyle sets him apart from other champions in League of Legends. As a support jungler, his strengths lie in his ability to provide immense utility to his team. One of his most notable strengths is his ability to create groves, which allow him to spawn friendly jungle camps. These camps can be shared with his allies, granting them gold and experience, providing a significant advantage in the early stages of the game.

Furthermore, Ivern possesses a powerful ability called

which allows him to pacify jungle monsters, turning them into allies. This ability not only aids Ivern in clearing the jungle quickly but also enables him to create unique gank opportunities by summoning these pacified monsters to assist him in battles.

However, Ivern's strengths come at a cost. His lack of traditional damage-dealing abilities makes him reliant on his teammates to secure kills. Additionally, his passive playstyle and focus on supporting his allies can leave him vulnerable to aggressive and high-damage champions. Ivern players must rely on their strategic decision-making and map awareness to excel in the game.

Ivern's Background in the Game

Ivern was introduced to the League of Legends roster on October 5, 2016. His arrival brought a breath of fresh air to the game, offering players a unique and unconventional playstyle. Ivern's abilities and mechanics challenged the traditional notions of a jungler, encouraging players to think outside the box and explore new strategies.

Over time, Ivern has undergone several balance changes and adjustments to ensure fair gameplay and maintain his viability in the ever-evolving meta. Riot Games, the creators of League of Legends, have continuously worked to refine Ivern's kit, ensuring that he remains a viable and enjoyable champion for players of all skill levels.

Ivern's Place in the Game

Ivern's place within the League of Legends universe is significant. As the Green Father, he represents the harmony between humanity and nature, reminding players of the importance of preserving the environment. His gentle and nurturing nature serves as a reminder that strength can be found in compassion and empathy.

Furthermore, Ivern's unique playstyle adds diversity to the game, offering players an alternative approach to the jungle role. His ability to support his team through utility and strategic decision-making makes him a valuable asset in team compositions that prioritize teamwork and coordination.

On the website developed for the League of Legends game, you can access a wealth of information and videos showcasing all of Ivern's skins. Each skin offers a unique visual and thematic experience, allowing players to further immerse themselves in the world of Ivern and his connection to nature.

In conclusion, Ivern, the Green Father, brings a refreshing and unconventional playstyle to the game of League of Legends. With his unique abilities and nurturing nature, he serves as a reminder of the importance of preserving the natural world. Whether you choose to embrace his support jungler playstyle or simply appreciate his role within the League of Legends universe, Ivern is a champion that leaves a lasting impression.

Ivern (Default)

Cost: N/A

Release Date: N/A

Ivern, the Green Father, is a unique and whimsical champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for his gentle nature and affinity for nature, Ivern has captured the hearts of players with his charming personality and gameplay mechanics. While Ivern has several skins available, his default appearance remains a fan favorite for many players. In this article, we will delve into the story behind Ivern's default costume and explore all the intricate details of this beloved skin.

The Story of Ivern's Default Costume

Ivern's default costume perfectly encapsulates his character and role as the Green Father. He appears as a tall, slender figure adorned in vibrant green robes, adorned with leaves and flowers. His long, flowing white hair and beard give him an ethereal and wise appearance. Ivern carries a staff made of twisted wood, topped with a glowing orb that emanates a soft green light. This staff serves as a conduit for his magical abilities and connection to the natural world.

The attention to detail in Ivern's default costume is truly remarkable. From the intricate patterns on his robes to the delicate flowers woven into his hair, every aspect of his design reflects his connection to nature. The vibrant green color palette further emphasizes his role as a champion who nurtures and protects the natural world. Ivern's default costume is a testament to the creativity and artistry of the League of Legends design team.

The Story of Ivern

Ivern's story within the League of Legends universe is as fascinating as his appearance. Once a human named Ivern Bramblefoot, he was transformed into a tree-like being after spending centuries in the enchanted forests of the Freljord. This transformation was a result of his deep connection with nature and his desire to protect it from harm. Now known as the Green Father, Ivern roams the Summoner's Rift, tending to the flora and fauna that inhabit the battlefield.

Ivern's gameplay revolves around his unique ability to befriend jungle monsters and turn them into allies. Instead of slaying these creatures, Ivern nurtures them, allowing them to grow stronger and aid him in battles. This pacifistic approach sets Ivern apart from other champions in the game, making him a truly one-of-a-kind character. His gentle nature and desire to protect the natural world make him a beloved champion among players who appreciate his unique playstyle.

Strengths and Weaknesses

Ivern's strengths lie in his ability to support his team and control the battlefield. His ability to befriend jungle monsters and create allies gives him a strong presence in the jungle, allowing him to secure objectives and provide vision for his team. Additionally, Ivern's supportive abilities, such as shielding and healing, make him a valuable asset in team fights. His unique playstyle and unexpected strategies can catch opponents off guard, making him a formidable opponent in the right hands.

However, Ivern also has his weaknesses. His lack of direct damage and reliance on his allies can make him vulnerable when caught alone. Additionally, his pacifistic playstyle may not appeal to players who prefer more aggressive champions. Ivern requires a deep understanding of the game and excellent map awareness to maximize his potential. Despite these weaknesses, skilled Ivern players can have a significant impact on the outcome of a match.

Explore Ivern's Appearances

If you're interested in exploring Ivern's various appearances and skins, you can find more information and videos on our dedicated page for the Green Father. From his default costume to his whimsical skins like
and
there's a skin to suit every player's taste. Discover the magic and charm of Ivern's appearances and unleash the power of nature on the Summoner's Rift.

Ivern (Astronaut Ivern)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: July 23, 2020

League of Legends is known for its diverse and imaginative skins, and one of the most unique and visually stunning skins in the game is

Released on July 23, 2020, this skin takes our beloved champion Ivern on an intergalactic adventure, transforming him into an astronaut exploring the cosmos.

The Astronaut Ivern skin is priced at 1350 RP, offering players a chance to experience Ivern in a whole new light. With its intricate details and space-themed effects, this skin truly stands out among the rest.

The Story of Astronaut Ivern

In the vast universe of League of Legends, Ivern has always been connected to nature and the magical forest. However, with the Astronaut Ivern skin, his story takes a cosmic turn. In this alternate universe, Ivern is a brave explorer who embarks on a mission to discover new worlds and protect the galaxy from any threats that may arise.

Equipped with a high-tech spacesuit, Astronaut Ivern is ready to venture into the unknown. His suit is adorned with futuristic details, including glowing panels and intricate circuitry. The skin also features a helmet with a transparent visor, allowing players to catch a glimpse of Ivern's friendly face as he floats through space.

One of the most captivating aspects of the Astronaut Ivern skin is the attention to detail in its animations and effects. When Ivern moves, he gracefully floats through the air, defying gravity with every step. His abilities are also transformed to match the cosmic theme, with stars and galaxies swirling around him as he casts spells.

For example, Ivern's Q ability, Rootcaller, now summons a cosmic vine that wraps around his enemies, immobilizing them. His W ability, Brushmaker, creates a celestial brush that leaves behind a trail of stardust as he moves through the jungle. Even his ultimate ability, Daisy!, summons a space-age version of his loyal companion, with a metallic appearance and glowing eyes.

Overall, the Astronaut Ivern skin offers a visually stunning and immersive experience for players who want to explore the cosmos alongside their favorite champion.

Ivern: The Green Father

Now that we've explored the depths of the Astronaut Ivern skin, let's take a closer look at the champion himself. Ivern, also known as the Green Father, is a unique support jungler in League of Legends. He is a gentle and benevolent being who seeks to protect nature and all its creatures.

Ivern's past in the game is closely tied to the magical forest known as the Twisted Treeline. Once a human named Ivern Bramblefoot, he was transformed into a tree-like being by the powerful magic of the forest. Now, he roams the Summoner's Rift, tending to the jungle and aiding his allies.

As a support jungler, Ivern excels at providing utility and protection for his team. His passive ability, Friend of the Forest, allows him to free jungle camps from their roots, creating friendly monsters that can be shared with his allies. This unique mechanic sets Ivern apart from other champions and encourages teamwork and cooperation.

Ivern's abilities revolve around his connection to nature. His Q ability, Rootcaller, sends out a vine that damages and roots the first enemy hit. His W ability, Brushmaker, creates a brush that grants vision and enhances his abilities when he stands near it. His E ability, Triggerseed, shields an ally and detonates after a short duration, slowing nearby enemies. Finally, his ultimate ability, Daisy!, summons a massive golem to aid him in battle.

While Ivern's strengths lie in his ability to provide support and utility, he does have weaknesses. His damage output is relatively low compared to other champions, and he relies heavily on his team to secure kills. Additionally, his passive ability requires coordination and communication with teammates to fully utilize its potential.

Despite his weaknesses, Ivern has found his place in the game as a unique and beloved champion. His gentle nature and dedication to protecting the forest have endeared him to players, making him a popular choice for those who value teamwork and support.

Explore Ivern's Appearances

If you're interested in learning more about Ivern and his various appearances in League of Legends, you've come to the right place. On this page, you can find information and videos showcasing all of Ivern's skins, including the Astronaut Ivern skin.

Whether you're a fan of the cosmic adventures of Astronaut Ivern or prefer his more traditional appearances, there's something for everyone to enjoy. Dive into the world of Ivern and discover the magic and wonder that this unique champion brings to the game.

So, what are you waiting for? Join Ivern on his intergalactic journey with the Astronaut Ivern skin or explore his other appearances to find the perfect fit for your playstyle. The cosmos awaits!

Ivern (Dunkmaster Ivern)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: April 1, 2021

League of Legends is known for its diverse and creative skins that allow players to customize their favorite champions. One such skin that has gained popularity among players is

This skin transforms the gentle and nature-loving champion, Ivern, into a basketball superstar ready to slam dunk his way to victory.

Released on April 1, 2021, the Dunkmaster Ivern skin is priced at 1350 RP, making it a moderately priced skin that offers a unique and entertaining experience for players who enjoy playing Ivern.

The Dunkmaster Ivern skin brings a whole new level of excitement to the game, with its basketball-themed design and animations. Ivern, who is usually seen as a peaceful and nurturing champion, is now transformed into a towering basketball player, complete with a basketball hoop staff and a basketball-shaped Daisy, his loyal companion.

The skin features several visual and audio changes that enhance the overall experience. Ivern's abilities are reimagined to fit the basketball theme, with his Q ability (Rootcaller) now resembling a basketball net, and his E ability (Triggerseed) appearing as a basketball being passed to his allies. Additionally, his ultimate ability (Daisy!) showcases Daisy dunking on enemies, adding a touch of flair to Ivern's gameplay.

Not only does the Dunkmaster Ivern skin offer visual enhancements, but it also provides a unique recall animation. When Ivern recalls, he jumps into a basketball hoop and is launched into the air, performing an impressive slam dunk before returning to the battlefield.

Now, let's take a closer look at Ivern, the champion behind the Dunkmaster Ivern skin. Ivern is a support jungler who stands out from other champions due to his pacifist nature. He is a mystical being who roams the forests, nurturing and protecting the natural world. Ivern's abilities revolve around his connection with nature, allowing him to create brush, shield allies, and summon Daisy, a powerful golem-like creature.

Despite his gentle demeanor, Ivern is a force to be reckoned with on the battlefield. His passive ability, Friend of the Forest, allows him to free jungle camps from their roots, creating friendly monsters that can be slain by his allies for gold and experience. This unique mechanic sets Ivern apart from other junglers, as he can focus on supporting his team rather than constantly farming the jungle.

Ivern's Q ability, Rootcaller, allows him to throw out a vine that damages and roots the first enemy hit. This ability is crucial for setting up ganks and catching opponents off guard. His W ability, Brushmaker, creates patches of brush that grant vision and enhance Ivern's abilities when he is within them. This ability is excellent for ambushing enemies and providing vision control in key areas of the map.

Ivern's E ability, Triggerseed, shields an ally and, after a short delay, detonates to slow nearby enemies. This ability is essential for protecting his teammates and disrupting the enemy team's movements. Finally, Ivern's ultimate ability, Daisy!, summons Daisy to fight alongside him. Daisy is a powerful ally who can knock up enemies and deal significant damage, making her a valuable asset in team fights.

Overall, Ivern is a unique and versatile champion who excels at supporting his team and controlling the map. His ability to create brush, shield allies, and summon Daisy provides a wide range of utility that can turn the tide of battles. While he may not be the most aggressive champion, his strategic gameplay and supportive nature make him a valuable asset in any team composition.

If you want to learn more about Ivern and his various appearances in League of Legends, you can find detailed information and videos on this page. Whether you're interested in his base skin or his exciting Dunkmaster skin, there's plenty to discover about this lovable champion.

So, gather your team, hit the courts, and slam dunk your way to victory with Dunkmaster Ivern!

Ivern (Old God Ivern)

Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: October 10, 2020

League of Legends is known for its vast array of champions, each with their own unique abilities and appearances. One such champion is Ivern, a gentle and nature-loving character who has captured the hearts of many players. With the release of the

skin, players can now experience a darker and more mysterious side of this beloved champion.

The

skin, priced at 1350 RP, was introduced to the game on October 10, 2020. This skin transforms Ivern into a sinister deity, embodying the power and darkness of ancient gods. With its intricate details and eerie color palette, the skin offers a fresh and exciting take on Ivern's character.

As players equip the

skin, they will notice the dramatic changes in Ivern's appearance. His once vibrant green attire is now replaced with dark, tattered robes adorned with ancient symbols. His staff, which was once adorned with flowers and leaves, is now a twisted and gnarled wooden staff, emanating an otherworldly aura. The skin truly captures the essence of an ancient and malevolent deity.

Furthermore, the

skin introduces new visual and sound effects to enhance the player's experience. Abilities such as Ivern's Q (Rootcaller) and E (Triggerseed) are given a more ominous and supernatural appearance, with dark tendrils and eerie glows. The sound effects accompanying these abilities are also modified to match the skin's theme, adding an extra layer of immersion.

Now, let's delve into the story behind Ivern's

transformation. Ivern, once a benevolent and caring guardian of the forest, stumbled upon an ancient artifact during his travels. Unbeknownst to him, this artifact was a conduit to the realm of the Old Gods, ancient and powerful beings who thrived on chaos and destruction.

As Ivern touched the artifact, he was consumed by the dark energies of the Old Gods. His once pure heart was tainted, and he became a vessel for their malevolence. The transformation was gradual but inevitable. Ivern's appearance changed, reflecting the darkness that now resided within him.

Despite his newfound power, Ivern's gentle nature still lingered within him. He sought to use his abilities to restore balance to the world, even if it meant harnessing the dark forces that now coursed through his veins. With his twisted staff and ominous presence, Ivern became a force to be reckoned with, capable of both destruction and restoration.

In terms of gameplay, Ivern is a unique support champion who excels at providing utility and protection for his team. His passive ability, Friend of the Forest, allows him to create groves in the jungle, which can be harvested to provide buffs for himself and his allies. This ability sets him apart from other champions, as he focuses on nurturing and supporting his team rather than dealing direct damage.

Ivern's Q ability, Rootcaller, allows him to root and damage enemies, providing crowd control and setting up plays for his team. His W ability, Brushmaker, creates brush zones that grant vision and enhance his abilities. His E ability, Triggerseed, shields and detonates, providing protection and additional damage. Finally, his ultimate ability, Daisy!, summons a powerful elemental to aid him in battle.

While Ivern's strengths lie in his ability to provide utility and support, he does have weaknesses. His lack of direct damage and reliance on his team can make him vulnerable when playing alone. Additionally, his unique playstyle requires good communication and coordination with teammates to fully utilize his abilities.

Overall, Ivern's

skin offers players a chance to explore a darker side of this beloved champion. With its intricate details, new visual and sound effects, and a captivating backstory, this skin is a must-have for any Ivern enthusiast. Whether you prefer the gentle guardian of the forest or the malevolent deity, Ivern's versatility and unique playstyle make him a valuable addition to any team.

For more information and videos showcasing all of Ivern's appearances, including the
skin, be sure to visit our page dedicated to this enchanting champion.

Ivern (Candy King Ivern)

Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: December 6, 2018

League of Legends is known for its vast array of champions, each with their own unique abilities and appearances. One such champion is Ivern, a gentle and nature-loving character who has captured the hearts of many players. With the release of the

skin on December 6, 2018, Ivern received a whimsical and delightful makeover that perfectly suits his playful personality.

The

skin is priced at 1350 RP, making it a moderately priced skin that offers a significant visual upgrade for Ivern enthusiasts. This skin transforms Ivern into a charming candy-themed character, complete with a candy cane staff, a gingerbread house for a home, and a candy-filled forest to roam.

Let's delve into the details of this delightful skin. Candy King Ivern's appearance is a feast for the eyes, with vibrant colors and intricate details. His once leafy green hair is now a vibrant pink, adorned with candy canes and lollipops. His clothing is a mix of sugary treats, with a candy cane-striped jacket and gingerbread buttons. Ivern's staff, which he uses to channel his magical abilities, has been transformed into a giant candy cane, adding a whimsical touch to his overall look.

One of the most visually striking aspects of the Candy King Ivern skin is his home, which is now a gingerbread house. This sweet abode perfectly complements Ivern's candy-themed appearance and adds to the overall charm of the skin. The forest surrounding Ivern is also transformed into a candy-filled wonderland, with candy canes, lollipops, and gumdrops scattered throughout. It's a visual treat that brings a smile to the faces of both Ivern players and their opponents.

Now that we've explored the Candy King Ivern skin in detail, let's take a moment to appreciate the champion himself. Ivern, also known as the Green Father, is a support jungler who brings a unique playstyle to the game. Unlike other champions who rely on brute force and aggression, Ivern focuses on nurturing and protecting the natural world.

In the lore of League of Legends, Ivern was once a man named Ivern Bramblefoot. After being betrayed and killed by his own friend, he was reborn as a nature spirit. Ivern now roams the forests, tending to its creatures and ensuring the balance of nature is maintained. His gentle nature and love for all living things make him a beloved character among players.

In terms of gameplay, Ivern's abilities revolve around his connection with nature. His passive ability, Friend of the Forest, allows him to free jungle camps by channeling his magic, creating friendly monsters that can be slain for gold and experience by his allies. This unique ability sets Ivern apart from other junglers and requires strategic thinking and coordination with teammates.

Ivern's other abilities include Rootcaller, which sends out a vine that damages and roots enemies, Triggerseed, which shields and slows enemies, and Daisy!, which summons a massive golem to aid Ivern in battle. These abilities, combined with his passive, make Ivern a versatile and supportive champion who excels at protecting his allies and disrupting the enemy team.

While Ivern's playstyle may not suit everyone, those who appreciate his nurturing nature and strategic gameplay find him to be a rewarding champion to master. His ability to create unique opportunities for his team and turn the tides of battle with well-timed shields and crowd control make him a valuable asset in any team composition.

If you're interested in learning more about Ivern and his various appearances, you can find information and videos on our dedicated page. Whether you're a fan of the Candy King Ivern skin or prefer his classic appearance, there's no denying the charm and uniqueness that Ivern brings to the world of League of Legends.
